name: Arbinger SEA
description:
"Combining the results of four decades of groundbreaking scholarly work on the phenomenon known as self-deception, Arbinger has built a simple yet profoundly effective framework for improving the influence of every leader and individual, whether at home or in the workplace.

Arbinger’s work is being used with resounding success in the areas of Leadership Development, Change Management, Conflict Transformation and creating high performing teams that propel organizations to higher plateaus of business excellence."
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Bringing Humanity to the Workplace
ShortDescription: Arbinger enables organizations and individuals to resolve their deepest and most difficult people problems— problems that have persisted despite all efforts to resolve them.

Highlights.name: Focus on Mindset
Highlights.description: Arbinger is a company that offers leadership training.

Highlights.name: Outward Mindset for Success
Highlights.description: Arbinger helps people develop a mindset that leads to better teamwork and results.

Highlights.name: Variety of Training Options
Highlights.description: They offer a variety of services including assessments, workshops, and webinars.

enhanced_description: Arbinger SEA offers a unique and profoundly effective framework, rooted in four decades of scholarly work on self-deception, designed to enhance the influence of leaders and individuals within organizations. This approach helps resolve persistent and complex 'people problems' and fosters an 'outward mindset' crucial for improved teamwork and business results. Arbinger's solutions are applied across Leadership Development, Change Management, Conflict Transformation, and in building high-performing teams to drive organizational transformation and excellence. Delivery methods include assessments, workshops, and webinars, focusing on accelerating skill development, improving employee happiness, and boosting engagement.
competitive_advantages: Framework built on four decades of scholarly work on self-deception
Focus on mindset change for profound and lasting impact
Ability to resolve deeply rooted and persistent people problems
Specialization in developing an 'Outward Mindset' for improved teamwork and results
implementation_scenarios: Structured training programs delivered via assessments
Integration with eLearning software and Learning Experience Systems (LXPs)
hr_functions_supported: Talent Management (specifically leadership and skill development)
roi_benefits: Improved influence of leaders and individuals
Propels organizations to higher plateaus of business excellence
Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
Resolution of deep and difficult people problems
primary_users: HR Professionals (especially L&D and OD roles)
deployment_options: Blended learning approach (combining digital and live training elements)
scalability_features: Designed for Large and Global Enterprises
Framework is widely applicable across individuals and teams
Offers various delivery methods (assessments, workshops, webinars) that can scale
